name: CQ.wcm.Design
doc: A helper class providing client side information about a CQ design.

props.name: content
props.doc: the content tree of this design

methods.name: getContent
methods.doc: Returns the content of this design.

methods.name: getPath
methods.doc: Returns the path of this design.

methods.name: getStyleEntry
methods.doc: Returns the style entry of this design for the given path

methods.name: getStyleProperty
methods.doc: Returns the style property for the given cell.
